content.description:
This goes up the steep face above the low table of rock on the backside of the boulder.   

  Sit start crimping on a good hold, and work your way up using the the vague, slopey arete on the left for your left hand and bad holds for your right.
content.protection: You'll need a pad if it is near your limit, because the crux is near the top and the landing is on the (flat) rock.
content.location: Go around the back of the boulder looking for the tallest face.

content.description: Sit start under the steep overhanging arête with left hand on a thin crimp and right hand on a higher pocket out right. Move up on thin holds and top out. Powerful and technical.
content.location: This ascends the steep left arête that faces the trail.

content.description: Sit start on crimp, move right hand up to a big pinch, hit a left crimp, and top out.
content.location: This ascends the steep, small cave on the left side of the boulder. Start a few feet right of the problem False Positive.

content.description: Sit start with crap hands and feet, power left to a small knob, move up, and top out.
content.location: This ascends the undercut, small, steep cave on the left side of the boulder.

content.description: Sit start the left side of the steep cylinder using a left heel up on the low shelf. Power up and traverse right across the steep, slopey bulge all the way to the far right arête, turn the corner to top out at the high point. Excellent.
content.location: This ascends the steep cylinder on the backside of the boulder.

content.description: Sit start the right arête, and move up. Kinda cool.
content.location: This ascends the short, ten foot egg near the trail that is about 30 feet away from the Gravity Boulder.

content.description: Sit start on the giant rock flake on poor slopers, and power right hand up into the thin seam. Lock off, and move left a few feet and then straight up to top out.
content.location: This ascends the right side of the boulder which is easily found by locating the 1000 pound flake on the ground.

pathTokens: Town Line Boulders aka South Woods

content.description: Basically this is one big block with good problems.
